The gallbladder stores bile, a fluid that aids in digestion of fat. Which of the following types of food should be avoided by a person whose gallbladder has been removed?

A student tried this problem

Which object in the solar system is orbited by a belt of asteroids?

The answer key might say D.

A) Pluto
B) Saturn
C) the Sun
D) the Moon

Answer with just the letter (A/B/C/D).
